description: Application for a non-material amendment following grant of planning permission Ref:P/2005/4387 dated 28/04/2008 for alteration, part conversion and extension (including two additional floors to the existing building, five-storey rear and ground floor extensions) to provide a total of 149 residential units (3 x studio and 146 x 2 bed units); provision of public library/adult learning and activity centre at ground floor level together with a business development centre/community group office and meeting space at first and second floor level in the new rear extension; 117 car parking spaces, cycle parking, vehicular access from The Green and Southbridge Way and other associated works : amendments consisting of alterations of glazing to all elevations, installation of balcony dividers, extension of cladding to roof extension and north elevation, installation of fire exit doors to ground floor south and north elevations, alterations to residential core incorporating relocated entrance and installation of ramp.
